body.transcript:
Hello! Thank you for calling Harmony Music School. My name is Randy Edwards. May I have your name, please?

Hi Randy, I'm Mary Parker.

Thank you, Mary. How can I assist you today with your billing issues?

I was surprised to see a charge on my account that I don't recognize.

I understand your concern, Mary. To help you further, could you please provide your account number?

Sure, it's two three three five six seven eight.

Thank you. Also, could you share the exact amount of the charge that surprised you?

It was one zero zero dollars.

Thank you for the information, Mary. Let me look into this charge for you right away.

I have found the issue, Mary. It seems there was an error in billing. We'll correct it immediately. Thank you for bringing it to our attention.

Thank you, Randy!

You're welcome, Mary. Thank you for your patience and for calling Harmony Music School. Have a great day!
